job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.industry: Hospital & Health Care,Health, Wellness and Fitness,Medical Devices
job.description: pstrongSummary strongppOur client a successful Medical Device company is seeking a talented Senior Software Engineer to join their team This exciting company is well known for their innovative and collaborative approach to deliver fresh breakthrough technology to power the future of healthcare In this role as a Senior Software Engineer you will apply technical expertise towards developing worldclass solutions using software engineering tools to solve complex technical problems related to surgical navigation robotics and ablation products This role would require either relocation or commute to office near Denver Colorado area ppbrppstrongJob ResponsibilitiesstrongpulliDesign develop test and document complex software components and applications related to surgical navigation robotics and ablation products using C andor CliliTroubleshoot debug maintain and support existing productsliliExecute on key success metrics in engineering and product roadmapliliWork in an Agile team environmentliulpbrppstrongSkills Requiredstrongpulli4 years of professional engineering experienceliliProven expertise in C andor C with NET frameworkliliExperience with other programming languages Python Go JavaliliExperience in largescale software design including OOAOOD and design patternsliulpbrppstrongContact DetailsstrongppThe full job description and company details are available upon application This position is being handled by James at Meet call 1 628 3362774 or email jamesgiustipeoplewithchemistrycom to discuss further and in confidencep
